info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:11PM EDT until July 24 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Southeastern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Western Ballard County in western Kentucky... Northeastern Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... East central Scott County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 211 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Tamms to near Mounds to 6 miles northwest of Charleston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Mounds, Barlow, Mound City, Wyatt, Olmsted, Pulaski and Wilson City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 16. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 14 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
